Properties.ProtectedString:
--Do Ke Ra! local Workspace = game.Workspace local Debris = game.Debris
local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Tool = script.Parent local Character = nil local Summon = waitForChild(script, "Summon")
local MeteorID = 90719419 local Meteor = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(MeteorID):GetChildren()[1]
local MeteorLifeTime = 5 local StaffCooldownTime = 6
function SummonMeteor(Target)
Summon:Play() wait(1) local ChaosMeteor = Meteor:Clone() ChaosMeteor.Name = "Meteor" local chilluns = ChaosMeteor:GetChildren() local angx, angy, angz = Character.Torso.CFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ() for i = 1, #chilluns do chilluns[i].CFrame = CFrame.Angles(angx, angy, angz) + (Target + Vector3.new(0, 150, 0)) end ChaosMeteor.Parent = Workspace
local RockScript = Tool.MeteorScript:Clone() RockScript.Parent = ChaosMeteor RockScript.Disabled = false
local Owner = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Owner.Name = "Owner" Owner.Value = Character Owner.Parent = RockScript
Debris:AddItem(ChaosMeteor, MeteorLifeTime)
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
end Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
function onEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent
end Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
function onUnequipped() Character = nil
end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
function onMessageRecieved(message) if message:IsA("Vector3Value") and message.Name == "SummonTarget" then SummonMeteor(message.Value) message:Destroy() end
end Tool.ChildAdded:connect(onMessageRecieved)

--INCOMING
local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Meteor = script.Parent local Rock = Meteor.Part
local Explosion = waitForChild(script, "Explosion") local Fall = waitForChild(script, "Fall")
local DeathSound = waitForChild(script, "WahWah")
local Owner = waitForChild(script, "Owner")
Fall:Play()
local TouchedEvent
Rock.Elasticity = 0
local ForceMultiplier = 2000 local FallForceMultiplier = 5000
local FallVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") FallVelocity.Name = "FallPush" FallVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) * FallForceMultiplier FallVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, FallForceMultiplier, 0) FallVelocity.P = FallForceMultiplier FallVelocity.Parent = Rock
--Creates a random number of particles and lets them fall down from the sky. function ParticleExplosion(Parent, Colors, MinParticles, MaxParticles, Offset, Lifetime, Force) local Debris = game.Debris
--Initialize to default values MinParticles = MinParticles or 0 MaxParticles = MaxParticles or 5 Offset = Offset or Vector3.new(0,0,0) Lifetime = Lifetime or 1
local NumParticles = math.random(MinParticles, MaxParticles) for i = 0, NumParticles do --Create the parts for the particles to emit from local ParticlePoint = Instance.new("Part") ParticlePoint.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) ParticlePoint.Parent = Parent ParticlePoint.Position = Parent.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-5,5), math.random(4, 7), math.random(-5,5) ) + Offset ParticlePoint.Transparency = 1
--Create the particles for display local Particle = Instance.new("Sparkles") local Color = BrickColor.Random().Color Particle.SparkleColor = Color Particle.Parent = ParticlePoint
--Send them flying local ParticleForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") ParticleForce.Parent = ParticlePoint ParticleForce.force = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), 40, math.random(-20,20)) * Force Debris:AddItem(ParticleForce, .3)
Debris:AddItem(ParticlePoint, Lifetime + math.random()) end
end
function RollingBallOfDeath(part) if(part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and Owner.Value ~= part.Parent) then part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid"):TakeDamage(100) if DeathSound and not DeathSound.IsPlaying then DeathSound:Play() end end end
function onHitGround(part) Fall:Stop() Explosion:Play()
Rock.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
Rock.FallPush:Destroy()
ParticleExplosion(Rock, {Color3.new(1,0,0), Color3.new(1, .5, 0)}, 25, 30, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), 1.5, 13)
TouchedEvent:disconnect()
local event = Rock.Touched:connect(RollingBallOfDeath)
wait(.25)
event:disconnect()
end TouchedEvent = Rock.Touched:connect(onHitGround)

local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local function PlayRandomAnimation(TrackTable) TrackTable[math.random(1, #TrackTable)]:Play() end
local function ClearAnimations(TrackTable) for i = 1, #TrackTable do TrackTable[i]:Stop() end end
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle local Character = nil
local function LoadAnim(Name) return waitForChild(Tool, Name) end
local SlashAnimations = { LoadAnim("StaffSlam"), }
local SlashAnimationTracks = {}
local IdleAnimations = { LoadAnim("StaffIdle"),
}
local IdleAnimationTracks = {}
local clientMouse = nil
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) if Humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = Player creatorTag.Parent = Humanoid game.Debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
local slash = nil Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
PlayRandomAnimation(SlashAnimationTracks)
local SummonTarget = Instance.new("Vector3Value") SummonTarget.Name = "SummonTarget" SummonTarget.Value = clientMouse.Hit.p SummonTarget.Parent = Tool
wait(6) Tool.Enabled = true end Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated)
function onEquipped(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
for i = 1, #SlashAnimations do SlashAnimationTracks[i] = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(SlashAnimations[i]) end
for i = 1, #IdleAnimations do IdleAnimationTracks[i] = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(IdleAnimations[i]) end
PlayRandomAnimation(IdleAnimationTracks)
clientMouse = mouse end Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
function onUnequipped() Character = nil ClearAnimations(IdleAnimationTracks) end Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
